::Squizzy::
Standing near the scanner, she nodded to LadyHawk. "Sure, no problem. 
I'll take care of things here. You go and get some rest. I'll keep an 
eye out here for you." she said in a cheerful tone.  She had a warm, 
genuine smile on her face.  She was just a naturally nice bot in 
general. She watched the scanners and jotted down the info that the 
scanner put out. 

Shadow Wing::
She didn't respond.  She stayed inside her chamber and didn't try to 
make the connection to communicate wtih Veratis.  She cold barely 
hear him, like he was whispering at her. But she couldn't make it out.
She was still a little hsaken from the power surge and didn't want to 
go through it again any time soon.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lady Hawk set up the lab equipment the best she could. Squizzy 
> watching her didn't make her job any easier. Once set up she placed 
> the somple of DNA from the bug she'd found into a scanner. The bug 
in 
> question was a scarab. She scanned the DNA into the computer. She 
> added the DNA she'd obtained when she'd picked up Rat Trap. the 
> computer scanned for similarities in the strutures. It would take 
at 
> least an hour for the comparison to be completed."Watch this for me 
> would you please, I'm gonna get a little rest before my 
presentation 
> to Zardus." She stepped into the corner and curled up. It wasn't 
the 
> luxuries that she fealt she deserved but many places that Veratis 
had 
> them stop lacked suitable surroundings.
> 
> Veratis studied the scans from the Protoform which housed the spark 
> of Shadow Wing. he thought it was time she was educated. The old 
> science bot attached the receptors again and went into the 
protoforms 
> mind. "Hello Shadow Wing, how's my favorite patient today?"
